short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: Lighted 一按即買令你購買更寫意，只需輕輕一按，隨時購買心水貨品。
short.en: With single click, buy your favorite items with Lighted Buy Button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
更新資訊
1.6 - 現支援12間商店，新增 Disney Store Japan
1.5 - 現支援11間商店，新增 AmAmi 及 Strapya
1.4 - 現支援9間商店，新增Volks，Bookoff online 及樂天

************************

只要網址右邊出現 Lighted Service 的 Logo，即代表網址上的貨品可在使用Lighted 購買，
你只需輕輕一按，貨品便會自動轉到 Lighted Service ，真正「一按即買」！
購買後將有將有電郵通知你訂單的最新狀況，再不用擔心你的貨品去向。
long.en:
Change Log:
1.6 - Now supporting 12 shopping sites, added Disney Store Japan
1.5 - Now supporting 11 shopping sites, added AmiAmi and Strapya
1.4 - Now supporting 9 shopping sites, added Volks, Bookoff online and Rakuten

************************

By clicking the Lighted Service Logo appear right to the location bar,
you can buy your favorite items immediately on Lighted.hk,
and then all you need to do are sit back and relax, we will handle the rest for you, 

You will receive the notification email with latest order status, 
no need to keep tracking your products and the order!
